data.name: Application.ProductName.Format
data.comment: {0} is Application.ProductName.Bare. {1} is the version number (e.g., "2.6"). {2} is either an empty string, or a version tag constructed with Application.ProductNage.Format (e.g., "Beta 5")

data.name: Application.ProductName.Tag.Format
data.comment: {0} is the version tag, e.g. Beta 5

data.name: SavePaletteDialog.TypeANameLabel.Text
data.value: Type a name for the palette:

data.name: SavePaletteDialog.PalettesLabel.Text
data.value: Palettes that have already been saved:

data.name: ColorPalette.SaveHeader
data.value: ; SIS Palette File ; Lines that start with a semicolon are comments ; Colors are written as 8-digit hexadecimal numbers: aarrggbb ; For example, this would specify green: FF00FF00 ; The alpha ('aa') value specifies how transparent a color is. FF is fully opaque, 00 is fully transparent. ; A palette must consist of ninety six (96) colors. If there are less than this, the remaining color ; slots will be set to white (FFFFFFFF). If there are more, then the remaining colors will be ignored.
data.comment: Yes, this should be translated. This is written to the beginning of palette files, which are stored in text files (*.txt). They are intended to be understandable by the user.

data.name: SystemLayer.UserDataDirName
data.comment: This is a directory that will be created in the My Documents folder.

data.name: ColorPalettes.UserDataSubDirName
data.comment: This is a directory that will be created in the directory that SystemLayer.UserDataDirName refers to.

data.name: CanvasSizeAction.ResizeDocument.OutOfMemory
data.value: Not enough memory to resize the canvas.

data.name: CanvasSizeDialog.NewSpaceLabel.Text
data.value: The new space will be filled with the secondary color.

data.name: CloneStampTool.HelpText
data.value: Hold Ctrl and left click to select an origin. Afterwards, left click and draw to copy

data.name: ColorPickerTool.HelpText
data.value: Left click to set primary color, right click to set secondary color

data.name: LayerPropertyChanging.HistoryMementoNameFormat
data.comment: {0} represents the layer index

data.name: DocumentWorkspace.InitializeEffects.DllLoadFailed.Format
data.value: There was an error loading {0}. It may be corrupt, or it may need to be recompiled.
data.comment: {0} is a file name

data.name: Generic.OutOfMemory
data.value: There was not enough memory to complete the operation.

data.name: AddNewBlankLayer.LayerName.Format
data.comment: {0} is the number of the new layer

data.name: DocumentWorkspace.DeleteLayerButtonClicked.MustHaveOneLayer
data.value: There must be at least one layer in an image.

data.name: EllipseSelectTool.HelpText
data.value: Click and drag to draw an elliptical selection. Hold shift to constrain to a circle.

data.name: EllipseTool.HelpText
data.value: Click and drag to draw an ellipse (right click for secondary color). Hold shift to constrain to a circle.

data.name: EraserTool.HelpText
data.value: Click and drag to erase a portion of the image

data.name: FreeformShapeTool.HelpText
data.value: Left click to draw a freeform shape with the primary color, right click to use the secondary color

data.name: ImportFromFileAction.AskForCanvasResize.OutOfMemory
data.value: Ran out of memory while trying to resize the image.

data.name: ImportFromFileAction.ImportOneLayer.OutOfMemory
data.value: Ran out of memory while trying to resize the layer.

data.name: ImportFromFileAction.ImportOneFile.NewLayer.Format
data.comment: {0} is the file being imported, {1} is the name of a layer within that file

data.name: LassoSelectTool.HelpText
data.value: Click and drag to draw the outline for a selection area.

data.name: GradientTool.HelpText
data.value: Click and drag to start drawing. Holding shift constrains the angle. Right mouse button reverses colors.

data.name: GradientTool.HelpText.WhileAdjusting.Format
data.value: Offset: {0}{1} x {2}{3}, Length: {4} {5}, Angle: {6}°. Holding other mouse button will move both nubs.

data.name: GradientTool.HelpText.Adjustable
data.value: Drag a nub to adjust the gradient. Right click nub to swap colors. Press Enter to finish, or Esc to undo.

data.name: LineTool.HelpText
data.value: Left click to draw with primary color, right click to use secondary color

data.name: LineTool.PreCurveHelpText
data.value: Drag nubs to curve line (right button for Bezier), or press Enter to finish line, or draw elsewhere for a new line.

data.name: LineTool.CurvingHelpText
data.value: Press Enter to finish the curve, or draw elsewhere for a new line. Tap Ctrl to toggle nubs.

data.name: MagicWandTool.HelpText
data.value: Click to select an area of similar color.

data.name: MoveTool.HelpText
data.value: Drag the selection to move. Drag the nubs to scale. Drag with right mouse button to rotate.

data.name: MoveSelectionTool.HelpText
data.value: Drag the selection to move. Drag the nubs to scale. Drag with right mouse button to rotate.

data.name: PaintBrushTool.HelpText
data.value: Left click to draw with primary color, right click to draw with secondary color

data.name: PaintBucketTool.HelpText
data.value: Left click to fill a region with the primary color, right click to fill with the secondary color

data.name: PanTool.HelpText
data.value: When zoomed in close, click and drag to navigate the image

data.name: SISInfo.FullAppName.Format
data.comment: {0} is the product name ("SIS"), {1} is the version string ("2.2.2000.3000")

data.name: SISInfo.VersionString.Format
data.comment: {0} is the friendly version name (configuration name), such as "Beta 2" or "Final". {1} is Debug or Release. {2} is the product version.

data.name: SISInfo.FriendlyVersionString.Format
data.comment: {0} is the version, such as "2.5". {1} is the configuration ("Beta 5") formatted via SISInfo.FriendlyVersionString.ConfigWithSpace.Format, or it is an empty string if the configuration is "Final"

data.name: PencilTool.HelpText
data.value: Left click to draw freeform, one-pixel wide lines with the primary color, right click to use the secondary color

data.name: ProgressDialog.PercentText.Text.Format
data.comment: {0} is a number from 0 to 100

data.name: RecolorTool.HelpText

data.name: RectangleSelectTool.HelpText
data.value: Click and drag to draw a rectangular selection. Hold shift to constrain to a square.

data.name: RectangleTool.HelpText
data.value: Click and drag to draw a rectangle (right click for secondary color). Hold shift to constrain to a square.

data.value: There was an error opening the file.

data.name: LoadImage.Error.UnauthorizedAccessException

data.value: Access is denied. Use File->Save As... to save under a different location or name.

data.name: SaveImage.Error.IOException

data.name: SaveImage.Error.OutOfMemoryException

data.name: WarnAboutFlattening.IntroText
data.value: Saving in this file format requires that the image is first "flattened", which reduces it to a single layer.

data.name: WarnAboutFlattening.FlattenTB.ExplanationText
data.value: The image will be flattened, and then saved. You will be able to undo the flatten operation after saving is finished.

data.value: There was an error copying the image to the clipboard.

data.name: CopyAction.Error.OutOfMemory

data.name: CopyAction.Error.Generic
data.value: There was an error copying to the clipboard.

data.name: Effects.RepeatMenuItem.Format
data.comment: {0} is the effect name

data.name: Effects.PluginLoadErrorsDialog.Message.Text
data.value: The following plugins failed to load. They may have been written for an older or newer version of SIS. If you already have the most up-to-date version of SIS, then you should check to see if there is an updated version of any plugin causing an error.

data.name: EffectErrorMessage.HeaderFormat
data.comment: {0} and {1} are numbers, and {1} is always greater than or equal to {0}. For example: "3 of 5" to indicate the 3rd out of 5 errors.

data.name: EffectErrorMessage.ShortFormat
EffectErrorMessage.FullFormat
data.comment: {0} is a full path name, such as "C:\Program Files\SIS\Effects\EdHarvey.dll" (localization not necessary). {1} is a display name such as "Surface Blur" (localization is handled by plugin). {2} is the version of the plugin or DLL, such as "1.2.345.6789" (localization handled by the .NET Framework's Version.ToString() method). {3} is a name or company name (localization handled by plugin), {4} is copyright information (localization handled by plugin), {5} is a valid website URL starting with http:// or https:// (localization handled by plugin). {6} is an exception string and is provided and localized by the .NET Framework (it is meant for the plugin author, and not necessarily important for the user to understand).

data.name: Effects.Name.Format.Configurable
data.comment: {0} is the effect name

data.name: PasteAction.Error.TransferFromClipboard
data.value: There was an error getting the image from the clipboard.

data.name: PasteAction.Error.OutOfMemory
data.value: Not enough memory to paste from the clipboard.

data.name: PasteAction.Error.NotRecognized
data.value: The image in the clipboard couldn't be recognized. Try re-copying it with the original application that was used to acquire it.

data.name: PasteAction.Error.NoImage
data.value: The clipboard doesn't contain an image.

data.name: PasteAction.Question.ExpandCanvas
data.value: The image being pasted is larger than the image canvas. Expand canvas to fit pasted image?

data.name: NewLayerAction.Error.OutOfMemory

data.name: StatusBar.Context.SelectedArea.Text.WithAngle.Format

data.comment: {0} is an X coordinate, {1} is units abbreviation, {2} is Y coordinate, {3} is units abbreviation, {4} is width, {5} is units abbreviation, {6} is height, {7} is units abbreviation, {8} is the area, {9} is plural units (pixels, inches), {10} is angle of rotation

data.comment: {0} is an integer

data.name: DentsEffect.Name
data.comment: Note to translators: The term 'dents' is a bit ambiguous here, so I'll defer to Ed Harvey's description: "Think of reflections off a shiny metal surface with a series of shallow indentations on it; similar hammer-worked copper like a polished version of this surface: http://www.getpaint.net/misc/HammeredCopper.jpg. Synonyms: (plural of) Dint, Indentation, Dimple, Pit."

data.name: UpdatesDialog.InfoText.Text.ReadyToCheckState

data.name: UpdatesDialog.InfoText.Text.CheckingState

data.name: UpdatesDialog.InfoText.Text.UpdateAvailableState

data.name: UpdatesDialog.InfoText.Text.DownloadingState
data.value: The update for SIS is being downloaded.

There was an error while checking for updates.

data.name: UpdatesDialog.InfoLabel.Text
data.value: A newer version of SIS is available. You may click the Install button to download and install it, or you may click Close to be reminded again in several days.

data.name: UpdatesDialog.BetaWarningLabel.Text
data.value: NOTE: This is a pre-release version (beta). It may not be stable.

data.name: UpdatesOptionsDialog.AutoCheckBox.Text
data.value: Automatically check for newer versions of SIS

data.name: UpdatesOptionsDialog.AllUsersNoticeLabel.Text
data.value: Note: These settings affect all users of this computer.

data.name: ExpiredDialog.Message
data.value:
This pre-release version of SIS has expired (30 days).
Click OK to go to the SIS website where you may download a newer version.

data.name: ExpiredTaskDialog.InfoText
data.value: This pre-release version of SIS has expired. To continue using SIS, you must update to the latest version.

data.name: ExpiredTaskDialog.CheckForUpdatesTB.ExplanationText
data.value: Check to see if an update is available, and then install it.

data.name: ExpiredTaskDialog.GoToWebSiteTB.ExplanationText
data.value: If checking for updates does not work, you may try going to the website to manually find an update.

data.name: ExpiredTaskDialog.DoNotCheckForUpdatesTB.ExplanationText
data.value: Exit SIS without checking for updates.

data.name: DownloadAndUnzipUpdateDialog.Error.Generic
data.value: There was an error downloading and installing the new version. Please try again later with the 'Help -> Check for Updates ...' menu command.

data.name: ConfirmLanguageDialog.IntroText
data.value: Changing the language requires that SIS be restarted.

data.name: ConfirmLanguageDialog.RestartTB.ExplanationText.Format

data.comment: {0} is the name of the new language that has been chosen (ex, "English").

data.name: ConfirmLanguageDialog.CancelTB.ExplanationText
data.value: Does not close SIS. Your language choice will be cancelled.

data.name: ClearOpenRecentList.Dialog.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear the Open Recent list?

data.name: NonAdminErrorBox.Message
data.value: You must be a system administrator to perform this action.

data.name: PngFileType.ConfigUI.Threshold.Description
data.value: Pixels with an alpha value less than the threshold will be fully transparent.

data.name: GifFileType.ConfigUI.Threshold.Description
data.value: Pixels with an alpha value less than the threshold will be fully transparent.

data.name: SetupWizard.MustCloseAppFirst.Text
data.value: Please ensure that SIS is closed, and then click Retry. Or, press Cancel to exit the setup wizard.

data.name: SetupWizard.HelpText
data.value:
SIS Installer Help
Command-line options:
/skipConfig - Skips configuration of options and install directory. Uses MSI properties in the following order of precedence: 1. supplied on command-line, 2. read from HKLM\Software\SIS, 3. default values. NOTE: Use of this option infers acceptance of the License Agreement. /auto - Automatic install. Infers /skipConfig. Does not show the final wizard page that details the result of installation. /createMsi - Creates MSI packages that may be used for deployment (AD/GPO) purposes. All properties specified on the command-line are merged into the MSI packages, so no further transforms are necessary. /verbose - Enables verbose Windows Installer MSI logging PROPERTY=VALUE - Sets an MSI property. See help file after installing for more information. You do not need to specify /saveMsi to specify properties.
Return code is 0 on success, or non-zero on failure.

data.name: SetupWizard.x86Msi.LaunchCondition.NotAllowedOn64bitOS
data.value: 32-bit MSI may not be installed on 64-bit OS.

data.name: Error.OSRequirement
data.value: SIS requires Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows Server 2003, or later.

data.name: SetupWizard.Error.AdminRequired
data.value: Administrator privilege is required to install SIS.

data.name: SetupWizard.CancelDialog.Message
data.value: The installation is not yet complete. Are you sure you want to exit?

data.name: SetupWizard.IntroPage.IntroText.Text.Format
data.value:
This installer will help you install {0}.
Choose the installation method you prefer, and then click Next.
data.comment: {0} is the product name.

data.name: SetupWizard.IntroPage.QuickDescription.Text
data.value: This is the recommended choice for most users. This installs using the default options, or the same options that were specified during a previous installation.

data.name: SetupWizard.IntroPage.CustomDescription.Text
data.value: Allows you to change the installation directory, and options related to file type associations and update checking.

data.name: SetupWizard.IntroPage.ExpirationWarning.Format
data.value: NOTE: This is a pre-release version of SIS that will expire on {0}.
data.comment: {0} is a date.

data.name: SetupWizard.LicensePage.IntroText.Text
data.value: Please take a moment to read the license agreement now. If you accept the terms below, click "I Agree", then "Next". Otherwise click "Cancel".

data.name: SetupWizard.OptionsPage.LaunchHandlingText.Text
data.value: Use these options to configure how SIS can be launched.

data.name: SetupWizard.OptionsPage.JpgPngBmpCheckBox.Text
data.value: Use it as the default image editor for JPEG, PNG, and BMP images

data.name: SetupWizard.OptionsPage.TgaCheckBox.Text
data.value: Use it as the default image editor for TGA images

data.name: SetupWizard.OptionsPage.DesktopShortcutCheckBox.Text
data.value: Create a shortcut on the Desktop

data.name: SetupWizard.OptionsPage.UpdatesText.Text
data.value: SIS can periodically check to see if there is a new version available and then notify you. No information is transmitted from your computer during this process. Note: You will only be notified of new versions while SIS is running.

data.name: SetupWizard.InstallDirPage.IntroText.Text.Format
data.value:
The installer will install {0} to the following folder.
To install in this folder, click "Next". To install to a different folder, enter it below or click "Browse".

data.name: SetupWizard.InstallDirPage.BadDirError.Message
data.value: The specified folder could not be created. You will need to choose another folder to install to.

data.name: SetupWizard.ReadyToInstallPage.IntroText.Text.Format
data.value:
The installer is ready to install {0} on your computer.
Click "Next" to start the installation.

data.name: SetupWizard.InstallingPage.InfoText.Text.Optimizing
data.value: Optimizing performance for your system. This may take a minute.

data.name: SetupWizard.InstallingPage.InfoText.Text.Success.Format
data.value: {0} was installed successfully. Click "Finish" to close this installation wizard.

data.name: SetupWizard.InstallingPage.InfoText.Text.Success.RebootRequired.Format
data.value: {0} was installed successfully. A reboot may be required to use it properly. Click "Finish" to close this installation wizard.

data.name: SetupWizard.InstallingPage.InfoText.Text.Failure.Format
data.value: There was an error while installing {0}.

data.name: SetupWizard.InstallingPage.PdnDonateBannerImage.Text
data.value: Thanks for using SIS. You can show your appreciation and support future development by donating!

data.name: SetupWizard.CreateMsiPage.IntroText.Text.Finished
data.value: The MSI packages have been placed into the following directory: '{0}'.

data.name: SetupWizard.InstallingPage.WhileInstallingLabel.Text
data.value: SIS is provided FREE OF CHARGE. If you paid money for it (other than to donate at the SIS website, of course) then we recommend that you get a refund!
data.comment: The area delimited with and is treated as a link. The destination URL is the donation page at the SIS website.

data.name: Setup.DesktopShortcut.Description
data.value: Create, edit, scan, and print images and photographs.

data.name: LaunchLink.Error
data.value: There was an error launching the link.

data.name: LaunchLink.Error.Format
data.value: There was an error launching the link: {0}
data.comment: {0} is a URL.

data.name: RadialBlurEffect.ConfigDialog.QualityDescription
data.value: Low quality is useful for quick previews, small images, or small angle values. High quality is useful for final quality, large images, or large angle values.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.ConnectFailure
data.value: The remote service point could not be contacted at the transport level.
data.comment: All of the WebExceptionStatus.* strings are copied straight from MSDN's documentation (except where explicitely noted), http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/cpref/html/frlrfsystemnetwebexceptionstatusclasstopic.asp

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.KeepAliveFailure
data.value: The connection for a request that specifies the keep-alive header was closed unexpectedly.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.MessageLengthLimitExceeded
data.value: A message was received that exceeded the specified limit when sending a request or receiving a response from the server.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.NameResolutionFailure
data.value: The name resolver service could not resolve the host name.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.Pending
data.value: An internal asynchronous request is pending.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.PipelineFailure
data.comment: This text is different than what is in the MSDN documentation.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.ProtocolError
data.value: The response received from the server was complete but indicated a protocol-level error. For example, an HTTP protocol error such as 401 Access Denied would use this status.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.ProtocolError.Format
data.value: The server returned the following error code: HTTP {1} ({0})
data.comment: {0} is a string name from the System.Net.HttpStatusCode enumeration. {1} is an integer, such as 404

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.ProxyNameResolutionFailure
data.value: The name resolver service could not resolve the proxy host name.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.ReceiveFailure
data.value: A complete response was not received from the remote server.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.RequestCanceled
data.comment: This text is different than what is in the MSDN documentation.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.SecureChannelFailure
data.value: An error occurred while establishing a connection using SSL.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.SendFailure
data.value: A complete request could not be sent to the remote server.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.ServerProtocolViolation
data.value: The server response was not a valid HTTP response.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.Timeout
data.value: No response was received during the time-out period for a request.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.TrustFailure
data.value: A server certificate could not be validated.

data.name: WebExceptionStatus.UnknownError
data.value: An exception of unknown type has occurred.

data.name: CurvesEffectConfigDialog.HelpText.Text
data.value: Tip: Right-click to remove control points.

data.name: CrashLog.HeaderText.Format
data.value: This text file was created because SIS crashed. Please e-mail this file to {0} so we can diagnose and fix the problem.
data.comment: {0} is an e-mail address, such as paint.net@hotmail.com

data.name: ExecuteFunction.GenericOutOfMemory
data.value: There was not enough memory to perform the action.

data.name: ExecuteFunction.GenericError
data.value: There was an error performing the action.

data.name: Updates.ExtractingState.GenericError
data.value: There was an error decompressing the download.

data.name: Updates.DownloadingState.GenericError
data.value: There was an unspecified error while downloading the update.

data.name: Updates.CheckingState.GenericError
data.value: There was an unspecified error while checking for updates.

data.name: UnsavedChangesDialog.InfoLabel.Text
data.value: The following images that are open have changes that have not been saved. You may click on a thumbnail to show the image in the main window.

data.name: UnsavedChangesDialog.SaveButton.ExplanationText
data.value: Save the images that are in the list above, and then exit.

data.name: UnsavedChangesDialog.DontSaveButton.ExplanationText
data.value: Discard all unsaved changes, and then exit.

data.name: ControlShadow.BetaTag.Text.Format
data.value: This is a pre-release version, and is recommended for testing purposes only. Expires on {1}. An update will be available before then. www.getpaint.net
data.comment: {0} is the full application name, e.g. "SIS v3.0 (Beta 1 Release build 3.0.2460.34921). {1} is a date string.

data.name: ChooseToolDefaultsDialog.IntroText.Text
data.value: You may choose the tool that is active when starting SIS, and what the defaults should be for the toolbar items.

data.name: ChooseToolDefaultsDialog.ToolConfigRow.ToleranceFloodMode.HeaderLabel.Text
data.value: Magic Wand, Paint Bucket, and Recolor

data.name: CloseWorkspaceAction.SaveButton.ExplanationText
data.value: Save the image, and then close it.

data.name: CloseWorkspaceAction.IntroText.Format
data.value: {0} has unsaved changes. What would you like to do?

data.name: ToolsControl.ToolToolTip.Format
data.comment: {0} is the tool's name (e.g. "Magic Wand"). {1} is a character that is the shortcut key (e.g. "C")

data.name: ToolConfigStrip.PenSizeIncButton.ToolTipText
data.value: Increase brush size Shortcut key: ] (hold Ctrl to increase by 5)

data.name: ToolConfigStrip.PenSizeDecButton.ToolTipText
data.value: Decrease brush size Shortcut key: [ (hold Ctrl to decrease by 5)

data.name: ToolConfigStrip.PenStartCapSplitButton.ToolTipText
data.value: Toggle start cap for line style Shortcut key: ,

data.name: ToolConfigStrip.PenDashStyleSplitButton.ToolTipText
data.value: Toggle dash type for line style Shortcut key: .

data.name: ToolConfigStrip.PenEndCapSplitButton.ToolTipText
data.value: Toggle end cap for line style Shortcut key: /

data.name: CloudsEffect.ConfigDialog.UsageLabel
data.value: To change the color that the clouds are drawn in, you can set the primary and secondary colors in the Colors window.

data.name: ExpandCanvasQuestion.IntroText
data.value: The image being pasted is larger than the canvas size. What do you want to do?

data.name: ExpandCanvasQuestion.YesTB.ExplanationText
data.value: Automatically expands the canvas to fit the image being pasted.

data.name: ExpandCanvasQuestion.NoTB.ExplanationText
data.value: Does not expand the canvas. You will have to move the pasted image around to make sure that the part you want is within the canvas boundaries.

data.name: DashStyle.Custom
data.comment: This string does not need to be translated. It is not used.

data.name: HelpFile.Url.Format
data.comment: Note to translators: This string only needs to be changed if the UA (user assistance, aka help file, documentation) is also being translated. {0} is the base website address, such as http://www.getpaint.net. This string is not required to have {0} in it. So if you want to distribute a language pack that hosts the help file elsewhere (that is to say, not on the official SIS website), you can do that by specifying the URL directly, e.g. "http://www.wherever.net/paintnethelp/fr/".

data.name: DocumentWorkspace.ShowFileDialog.ProgressText.Format
data.comment: {0} is the number of the current item, {1} is the total number of items. Example: "5 of 7"

data.name: DocumentWorkspace.ShowFileDialog.ItemFailureDialog.IntroText.Format
data.value:
There was an error transferring the image:
{0}
data.comment: {0} is an error message, which will be populated by the operation system in the language that it is configured for.

data.name: DocumentWorkspace.ShowFileDialog.SkipTB.ExplanationText
data.value: Skips this image, and moves on to the next one.

data.name: DocumentWorkspace.ShowFileDialog.CancelTB.ExplanationText
data.value: Cancels the transfer, and lets you reselect which images to open.

data.name: SaveAs.OverwriteConfirmation.Text.Format
data.value: {0} already exists. Do you want to replace it?
data.comment: {0} is a relative filename. e.g. "Untitled.png"

data.name: ToolConfigStrip.SelectionCombineModeSplitButton.Union.Text
data.comment: This is the name for a 'boolean OR' combination of two selections. More information is available at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Union_%28set_theory%29

data.name: ToolConfigStrip.SelectionCombineModeSplitButton.Intersect.Text
data.comment: This is the name for a 'boolean AND' combination of two selections. More information is available at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intersection_%28set_theory%29

data.name: Effect.PluginErrorDialog.IntroText
data.value:
This plugin has encountered an error, and must be closed.
Because of the unpredictable nature of these types of errors, it is strongly recommended that you restart SIS before proceeding. Otherwise, there could be further stability problems or data corruption.

data.name: Effect.PluginErrorDialog.RestartTB.ExplanationText
data.value: Closes the plugin, and then closes your opened images and restarts SIS. You will be asked to save changes if necessary.

data.name: Effect.PluginErrorDialog.DoNotRestartTB.ExplanationText
data.value: Closes the plugin, but does not close or restart SIS.

data.name: BlockedPluginException.UnstablePlugin
data.value: This plugin is known to cause stability problems, and has been blocked from loading.

data.name: BlockedPluginException.PluginIsNowBuiltIn
data.value: This plugin is now built-in to SIS.

data.name: Startup.MDIwarning
data.value: "WARNING! This software is designed to support multiple documents at the same time (MDI). However, full support for this is not yet implemented so DON'T try it! Always close a document before opening another.
